title: App Development
overview: The App Development course provides learners with the skills and knowledge to build fully functional mobile applications. This course covers the development process for both iOS and Android platforms, focusing on UI/UX design, database integration, APIs, and deployment. By the end of this course, students will be able to create dynamic and responsive mobile apps using modern frameworks and tools.
courseDetails: In this course, you will learn how to design, develop, and deploy mobile applications from scratch. Starting with the basics of mobile development, the course progresses to cover advanced concepts like app optimization, data handling, and integrating third-party services. By the end of the course, you will have built several real-world applications and be equipped to pursue a career as a mobile app developer.
certification: Upon completing this course, you will receive a certificate, qualifying you as a Certified App Developer.

Modules.name: User Interface (UI) Design for Mobile Apps
Java and Kotlin for Android Development
Xcode IDE and iOS SDK Setup
React Native for Hybrid App Development
Handling Data in Mobile Apps (Databases, Firebase)
Working with Sensors and Device Features (Camera, GPS, etc.)
Storing Data Locally and Cloud Integration
Deploying Android Apps to Google Play Store
Deploying iOS Apps to the Apple App Store
Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) for Apps
Final Project: Develop and Deploy a Complete Mobile App

Highlight.name: Learn Popular Frameworks like Flutter and React Native
Work with Firebase and Cloud-Based Databases
Master API Integration for Dynamic Apps
App Deployment on Google Play and Apple Store
